achievements.title: Gettin' your keys on!
achievements.desc: You don't know what you've just listened to, but you like it.

achievements.title: This is even better live
achievements.desc: Proudly display the badges you have earned in the fancafe.

achievements.title: Dreaming of the city
achievements.desc: Your musical knowledge has expanded so much you are tempted to make a career out of it.

achievements.title: Hall of Fame
achievements.desc: The stage is now your second home.
